scripts.start: concurrently  "cd user && npm start" "cd product && npm start" "cd userProducts && npm start " "node app.js"
scripts.devInstall: concurrently "npm install " "cd user && npm install && npm run restore" "cd product && npm install && npm run restore" "cd userProducts && npm install "
scripts.restore: concurrently  "cd user && npm run restore" "cd product && npm run restore"
scripts.start:dev: concurrently  "cd user && npm run dev" "cd product && npm run dev" "cd userProducts && npm run dev " "nodemon app.js "
